messages.message: Hey team, I cannot find a channel related to the metrics app - so I thought I would ask here. If we grant someone access to view the metrics app, will that show for all use cases within a customers environmnet, or is there a way we can only show metrics for that users projects? I.e which subspaces they have access to
it would be global metrics for everyone on the platform. we don't have metrics scoped to a user

thats cool, wanted to check :smile: thanks @Heymian for answering all my questions that I ask :smile: (BTW JPMC Loved the guide on the mounting local file storage, was clear and easy for them, so thank you for the info)
